item.title: Breaching the sensitive action zone in Entra ID PIM
item.description: Entra ID Privileged Identity Management (PIM) is a great security service if used correctly.

item.title: Exposing Azure AD Roles with privileged access groups
item.description: In this article I will dig into the possible ways of adding memberships in roles and groups in Azure AD and Azure resources.
